name: The Lemonade
description:
As a scrawny goblin, find lemons in a cave to enjoy a glass of freshly squeezed lemonade.

Features:
  • Solve sour puzzles based around lemons
  • Unlimited undo
  • Soft goals: easy to finish, hard to 100%
  • Find mundane objects to enhance your capabilities
  • Fully voiced in a language you most likely don't understand
